Chuck Hinson wrote:
> Does anybody know how the expert groups work? Is there a public
> mailing list where non-expert-group-members can be heard, or does this
> all take place on some private mailing list?
> 

This is starting to change. A few are operating in public like JSR 305:

http://jcp.org/en/jsr/detail?id=305

Most are still private with limited public review. I do not know which 
approach 311 plans to take.
